verses.verse: Then <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> out of the <S%H1710>fish<s%>'s <S%H4578>belly<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H7121>cried<s%> by reason of my <S%H6869>affliction<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and he <S%H6030>heard<s%> <S%H990>me<s%>; out of the belly of <S%H7585>hell<s%> <S%H7768>cried<s%> <S%H8085>I<s%>, and you heard my <S%H6963>voice<s%>.

For you had <S%H7993>cast<s%> me into the <S%H4688>deep<s%>, in the <S%H3824>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%>; and the <S%H5104>floods<s%> <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> me <S%H4867>about<s%>: all your billows and your <S%H1530>waves<s%> passed over <S%H5674>me<s%>.
Then I <S%H559>said<s%>, I am cast <S%H1644>out<s%> of your <S%H5869>sight<s%>; yet I will <S%H5027>look<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> toward your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>.

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> surrounded me <S%H661>about<s%>, even to the <S%H5315>soul<s%>: the <S%H8415>depth<s%> closed me round <S%H5437>about<s%>, the <S%H5488>weeds<s%> were wrapped <S%H2280>about<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%>.

I went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7095>bottoms<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>; the <S%H776>earth<s%> with her <S%H1280>bars<s%> was about me for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: yet have you brought <S%H5927>up<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H7845>corruption<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>.

When my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5848>fainted<s%> inside me I <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H6944>you<s%>, into your holy <S%H1964>temple<s%>.

But I will <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto you with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>; I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> that that I have <S%H5087>vowed<s%>. <S%H3444>Salvation<s%> is of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto the <S%H1709>fish<s%>, and it vomited <S%H6958>out<s%> <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> upon the dry <S%H3004>land<s%>.
